name: Saint Seiya -Il Mito
description: Playing as the Bronze Saints you will face the threat of the Athens' Sanctuary in order to save Goddess Athena and bring back justice on Earth. Game developed with RPGMaker2k3 and Android porting done thanks to the EasyRPG project. Saint Seiya -The Myth- is an amatorial videogame, a graphical adventure / RPG, with the Bronze Saints and their deeds as main characters. The game was created for fun by fans (Saint Seiya Team) for the fans, with no profits. All the material is free to use, but all the rights and the correspondent brands are property of Masami Kurumada and Toei Animation. We reserve for us the moral rights for the work done.
